flawed_nl_solution:
He increases the length to 13+2=<<13+2=15>>15 feet
He increases the width to 18+2=<<18+2=20>>20 feet
So the rooms are 15*20=<<15*20=300>>300 square feet
So he has 1+3=<<1+3=9>>9 rooms of this size
So he has 9*300=<<9*300=2700>>2700 square feet of rooms this size
He also has one room of size 300*2=<<300*2=600>>600 square feet
So he has 2700+600=<<2700+600=3300>>3300 square feet of rooms
#### 3300

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
